articles.title: Thunderbirds topple Blazers to roll into Memorial Cup semifinal - ESPN - ESPN
articles.description: The Seattle Thunderbirds beat the host Kamloops Blazers 6-1 on Wednesday night to advance to the Memorial Cup semifinal.
